mapper.select: select count(*) from course c left join user_activity ua on ua.teacher_user_id = c.teacher_user_id left join users ut on ut.id = c.teacher_user_id left join users us on us.id = ua.student_id where ua.course_id <> 0 and c.id = #{courseId} and ua.teacher_user_id = #{teacherUserId}

select c.id as course_id, c.course_name, ua.teacher_user_id, ut.name as teacher_name, c.total_score,ua.achieve from course c left join user_activity ua on ua.teacher_user_id = c.teacher_user_id left join users ut on ut.id = c.teacher_user_id left join users us on us.id = ua.student_id where ua.course_id <> 0 and us.id = #{studentId} limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize}
